name: Notion Travel Planner
description: Plan your dream getaway with ease using our Ultimate Travel Template. Our template allows you to effortlessly organise your itinerary, flights, accommodation, activities, all in one convenient place. With built-in features such Quick Capture and Notifications, you'll always stay on top of your travel plans, ensuring a stress-free and enjoyable holiday. Plus, check lists and to-do lists ensure you won't forget a thing. Start planning your next adventure today!Top Features:Quick CaptureNotificatio
features: Quick Capture; Notification Box; Resource Management & Tagging System; Monthly Calendar with To-Do List; Travel Journal
